# traitCollection

**Instance Property**

Traits that determine the appearance of the map snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var traitCollection: UITraitCollection { get set }
```

## Configuring the image output

- **size**: The size of the image that you want to create.
- **appearance**: The visual style (light or dark) to apply to the map when rendering the snapshot image.
- **scale**: The scale factor to use when creating the image.

items.description: The size of the image that you want to create.
